pages.text: $(li)The Thorns enchantment can be applied in any kind of Helmet, Chestplate, Leggins, Boots, Shields, Horse and Wolf Armors.$(br)$(li)This enchantment causes damage to any creature that attack you.
pages.title: Thorns

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level III.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level IV of this enchantment using an Ancient Tome (Thorns).
